A very great concern for projecting or modeling the waves of mass infection is the variants. The problem may exist that the pandemic of d614g Wuhan strain earned immunity or even vaccinated immunity from covid19 may not protect you from say Delta plus here b.617.2 ay.4.2 variants continue to re infect previously recovered victims. This increases the fatality from 2.1% un vaccinated to over 5% given multiple exposures to new variants. A real problem. Hopefully 2024 will be clean of this 🙏 😬 7 billion people on Earth have now been given 7 billion doses. Although most are 2 dose and some million s have none! Hopefully India and SII production will lead the way and look after Africa when their excess vaccine supplies mature.
